title: Is It Easy Being Green?
source: The New York Review of Books
full_text: Is It Easy Being Green?. To the Editors: Regarding Bill McKibben’s review of The Story of CO 2 Is the Story of Everything [“It’s a Gas,” NYR, January 15], and with all due respect to McKibben, I believe that his characterization of the transition to a wind and solar economy as someth….
